attributes.additional_details:
I would like all private details removed from 192.com. I find it rediculus that a Government department gave my details away to be shared on the internet for all to see, this includes fraudsters, and other criminal/commercial minded persons. Is your private details shared on the internet with www.192.com?
No one asked me if I wanted the world to know my address, or who lives here or telephone number, only a foul would agree to that.
I feel sorry for the older generation who don't have internet and don't know that fraudsters etc can see who is in there home.
CLOSE THE SITE DOWN NOW

rejection.details: This is a matter for OFCOM.
